All the best hair and make-up looks from the 75th Golden Globe Awards

Golden Globes 2018: The Best Beauty Looks

We earn a commission for products purchased through some links in this article.

From vampy lipstick to fiery, smokey eyes, take a closer look at the best hair and make-up from the Golden Globe Awards 2018. View Gallery 19 Photos Getty Images 1 of 19 Gal Gadot The actress wore a berry lip to the Golden Globes Getty Images 2 of 19 Alicia Vikander The actress wore a low bun to the Golden Globes Getty Images 3 of 19 Zoe Kravitz The actress and singer paired an orange lip with classic eyeliner at the Golden Globes Getty Images 4 of 19 Saoirse Ronan The actress wore her hair slicked back and make-up fresh to the Golden Globes Getty Images 5 of 19 Allison Williams The actress wore a bronze, smokey eye with an updo at the Golden Globes Getty Images 6 of 19 Emilia Clarke The actress wore her hair in a bleached, sleek bob alongside a hot pink lipstick to the 75th Annual Golden Globes Getty Images 7 of 19 Kendall Jenner The model wore a messy bob with a nude lip to the awards show . Getty Images 8 of 19 Millie Bobby Brown The actress wore a cat-eye eyeliner flick with a sleek bun to the awards show Getty Images 9 of 19 Sadie Sink The Stranger Things 2 actress opted for pink eyeshadow with a ponytail to the Golden Globes Getty Images 10 of 19 Jessica Chastain The actress went for old-school Hollywood glamour with a side-parting and red lip to the Golden Globes Getty Images 11 of 19 Salma Hayek The actress wore her hair in loose curls with bronzed make-up for the Golden Globes 12 of 19 Isabelle Huppert The actress went for old-school Hollywood glam with a red lip and side parting 13 of 19 Jessica Biel The actress wore a pink lip Getty Images 14 of 19 Sarah Jessica Parker The actress and designer wore a grey, smokey eye Getty Images 15 of 19 Natalie Portman The actress wore a brown, smokey eye Getty Images 16 of 19 Viola Davis Viola Davis paired warm, glamorous make-up with an afro Getty Images 17 of 19 Naomi Campbell Naomi Campbell wore her hair sleek and paired it with a smokey eye Getty Images 18 of 19 Emma Watson The actress paired her new fringe with an orange lip Getty Images 19 of 19 Elisabeth Moss The actress went for young and fresh makeup and a pretty up-do Next 11 Make-Up Products A-Listers Genuinely Love Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
